comment: Cattage is AWFUL!!! She reads straight from the powerpoints for 2 hours. The actual class isn't hard, but her teaching SUCKS. I really don't know how she has a job at KSU. She's very negative... she always talks about suicide and depressing topics. It's really strange. I would NOT take here again!! Don't waste your time with her!

Terriable teacher, but nice. She's boring, only reads from powerpoints, and has a class activity almost every class; she doesn't know anyone by name, is very unclear as to what she wants for assignments, and  isn't willing to help much when asking questions. She may be an easy A, but if you want to learn anything do not take her class.
She is not a good teacher, she just reads the powerpoints and does not explain what she wants you to do.Is not nice when you don't understand. Very rude.

She is an ok teacher. Just do the work and be there for the class activities and you will be fine. The class is really boring though and she just goes over powerpoints that she later puts online. Easy A if you go to class

She doesn't explain what she wants in the few papers you have to write.  reads ppt's straight off screen for 2 hrs.  attendance can be manditory depends on if your watching a movie or not but you never know until that class.

So far, I love this teacher. She is such a sweet lady and has a great sense of humor. Her class is pretty easy. A few group assignments, a journal of "field Exp", and a couple papers. NO TESTS OR QUIZZES!! concidering this is close to the equivelent of developmental psych, its a cake walk.Listen to lecture, comprehend the info and participate. easy

what a nightmare!! i agree with everyone else, WASTE of time! she doesnt explain assignments and teaches nothing. she takes attendence, and sitting through this class for 2 hours is a small form of torture. if you must take her, it seems that she grades pretty easily. but overall, you learn nothing and waste your time.
She's real nice, but not a great teacher.  She's somewhat unorganized and not very clear on the reqirements of her assignments.  But, if you have to take her, it won't be the end of the world.

I loved her class.  No tests or quizzes, just presentations on chapters and a couple of papers.  She is VERY understanding and helpful!  She has one of the best personalities I've meet and always has a positive outlook.  She will give extendsions on work and is willing to work with you.

This teacher is ridiculous. She didnt even teach, instead just read page by page from the text which is not really teaching. Gave study guides that were a waste and the test was not relevant to the nine packets of study guides. This was the first class I've ever had to drop. Whatever you do DONT take this teacher.

This class was a a waste of time, she never taught and always had us do presentations on the chapters.  The tests were from the book, but the study guides do not help you.  She doesn't follow the syllabus and make sure you get the most up to date book in the class even though the syllabus says otherwise.

This class was an extreme waste of time.  All it consisted of was the class giving group presentations all semester - she only lectured maybe 3 or 4 out of 30 or so classes.  And the test material had absolutely nothing to do with any lecture.  Extremely boring!  That being said, if you go to class and do the presentations, you should do well.

She is nice, but everyone suspects that she is new to teaching. She lectures a lot. It is sometimes hard to understand her. There are group presentations and projects, but they are very easy. If you can't find anyone better, then take her, but she is not my first choice. Her test easiness level fluctuated from HARD to easy to HARD...
